CD.AEM: The ERP mission is to Implement, maintain, improve, and support the County's integrated financial, procurement, human resource and payroll information systems.
CD.CP: Welcome to the ERP National Mission Project under NME ICT, Ministry of HRD, Govt. of India. A multi-institutional team headed by IIT Kanpur, many projects like Brihaspati, Brihaspati Genral Accounting system, Purchase and Inventory Control System etc are current projects of ERP MISSION which are running successfully
CD.RES: The ERP Department is responsible for: Ensure system functionality, operability, and security of the Lawson ERP System and Kronos Time Keeping System. Train and support County users of the enterprise applications. Provide accurate high-level analytical reporting services to departments. Assist departments in streamlining County processes using the ERP systems.
